name: Ego (AtomZ Productions)
description:
Ego, by AtomZ Producitons (Zuriel Joven), is a short clicker game about awesomeness and ego inflation.

Play through the game in less than five minutes, and achieve one of two endings, both of which convey a message about the dangers of ego inflation in the pursuit of awesomeness.

This was developed during The Very First Extra Credits Game Jam in a timespan of about 48 hours.

This was my second game and game jam participation, and albeit the game is pretty low-quality, I've never made a game this fast in my life, so this is a personal feat I am very proud of.

Thanks for checking this out, and stay humble!
